name: WOSCOPS
tagline: WOSCOPS Open Shopping Cart Over Parse and Stripe
body:
# WOSCOPS
An open source and free online store front for independent artists to market directly to the public, initially for [sintamani](http://www.sintamani.com).
The intention is to have a completely free implementation of an ecommerce website, albeit using proprietary web services (Stripe and Parse). It is aimed at those just starting out, or for those with small inventory ecommerce requirements. 

### Work in Progress
This is currently (Aug 2014) non-functional, so any coding help gratefully received.

## Acknowledgements
Based on the following...
### [AngularJS Shopping Cart](https://github.com/kenyee/angularjs-cart)
For the AngularJS shop front code, which in turn is a fork from [Bernado Castilho's sample on Code Project](http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/576246/A-Shopping-Cart-Application-Built-with-AngularJS).
### [PureCSS](http://purecss.io/)
For the CSS layout (Photo Gallery and Landing Page).
### [Stripe Shop](https://github.com/stripe/shop)
For the backend server Parse code (with which I need a lot of help).

## Services
Requires accounts with...
### [Stripe](https://stripe.com)
To accept credit card payments. This is limited to specific countries, including UK, USA, Canada (maybe others).
### [Parse](https://parse.com/)
To host the server backend (cloud). The shop itself can also be hosted within the cloud, which offers a free https page necessary.
